project.name: Apache
project.description: The Apache herd maintains the Apache httpd server, an eclass to use the Apache build infrastructure, and many of its modules.

longdescription.p: The Apache herd is responsible for maintaining the Apache httpd server in Gentoo, and many of its modules. We also maintain a build infrastructure so that other modules may be easily added in a standard way to Apache.
longdescription.note: We do not maintain any of the other apache.org projects. Check the metadata.xml of those packages for the correct maintainer.
